mcq.statement: What does the idiom 'on guard' imply when someone says they are 'on guard'?

options.a: They are preparing for a meal
options.c: They are being watchful or vigilant
options.d: They are starting a new project

mcq.one_liner: The idiom 'on guard' means being watchful or vigilant, ready to face or deal with any potential trouble or danger.
